text: Youhou ! ImageJFX searched and indexed all scientifics Image Data located your folder.
Now let's see what we can do with it.
ImageJFX sees your data at different levels : Image files, planes, or objects
In a "File Level", you see each and every individual image files from your dataset.
When using elements from this mode, the batch processing or the batch segmentation will use the whole file as input.
In the "Plane Level", ImageJFX indexes all the planes of your multidimensional image files.
In this mode, you can apply operations to specific planes or type of planes. e.g. only the first channel
The last mode allows you to access all the object you previously segmented from your images.
...but no matter the mode, you can always filter the elements inside.
Now if you want me to tell you more about the explorer, use this button.
